question: Which among the following was the earliest drama of Kalidasa?
explanation: The M훮lavik훮gnimitram is a Sanskrit play written by K훮lid훮sa. It is his first play. The play tells the story of the love of Agnimitra, the Shunga Emperor at Vidisha, for the beautiful handmaiden of his chief queen. He falls in love with the picture of an exiled servant girl named Malavika.
